AmountDC.description: Amount in the default currency of the company

AmountFC.description: Amount in the currency of the transaction

Costcenter.description: Cost center linked to the subscription line

Costunit.description: Cost unit linked to the subscription line

CustomField.description: Custom field endpoint. Provided only for the Exact Online Premium users.

Discount.description: Discount percentage of the subscription line

Division.description: Code of division the subscription line is made

EntryID.description: Entry ID referencing to the subscription

FromDate.description: The date which the subscription line starts

Item.description: The item that is used by the subscription line for sales details. Reference to Item

ItemDescription.description: Description of Item used by the subscription line

LineNumber.description: Line number of the subscription line per subscription

Modified.description: Date and time when the subscription line has been modified

NetPrice.description: Net price in the currency of the transaction

Notes.description: To add or retrieve additional information in the subscription line

Quantity.description: Quantity of item used in the subscription line

SubscriptionNumber.description: Subscription number of the subscription line per subscription

ToDate.description: The date the subscription line ends

UnitCode.description: The code of the unit used in the subscription line. E.g: kg, meter

UnitDescription.description: Description of Unit used in the subscription line

UnitPrice.description: Unit price in the currency of the transaction (price * unit factor)

VATAmountFC.description: Vat Amount in the currency of the transaction

VATCode.description: VAT code that is used in the subscription line

VATCodeDescription.description: Description of VAT code that is used in the subscription line
